General.Name: True North Gems Inc
General.Description: True North Gems Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It holds 100% interest in the True Blue property comprises 303 claims located to the south of Ross River, Yukon; the Chuchinka base and precious metal property that covering an area of 562.5186 hectares located to east of Castlegar in southeastern British Columbia; and Cobalt Hill gold-copper-cobalt property, which covering an area of 421.467 hectares located in south central British Columbia. It also holds Cyr-Kapiwak lithium project comprising 42 mineral claims covering an area of 2,220.02 hectares located in the James Bay, Quebec; the Decelles property that consists of 215 claims located in the Abitibi, northwestern Quebec; and the Nabikok property, which consists of 155 claims located in the Abitibi, northwestern Quebec. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1027 Davie Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4L2
